high_descs: Turn right and go towards the door, then turn right again to go to the black table and look downward.
Pick up the butter knife on the black table.
Look upward to view the tomato on the black table.
Slice the tomato on the black table.
anns.task_desc: Slice a tomato on the black table.

high_descs: Turn right, turn right at the door, walk to the small black table to the left of the white table.
Pick up the knife to the right of the apple.
Look up from the black table.
Stand there and hold the knife.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the knife from the table.

high_descs: Turn right and hang a right at the door to reach the small black table.
Pick up the knife to the right of the apple on the right side of the table.
Look up at the tomato in the far right corner of the table.
Slice the tomato with the knife on the table.
anns.task_desc: Slice a tomato on a table.
